caller_intent: The agent is verifying the customer's insurance policy details (address, contact information, and policy status) as part of an annual check to prepare for policy renewal in July.
resolution_steps: Confirmed customer's name, address, and contact information (email and phone number).
Notified customer of an annual policy review to ensure accuracy ahead of the July renewal.
Attempted to access the policy system but encountered technical issues.
Offered to call back later when the system is operational.
Acknowledged customer's prior payment for the year and confirmed no immediate changes were needed.
summary: An Alliance Insurance agent conducted an annual policy verification call with a Spanish-speaking customer, confirming their contact details and policy status ahead of a July renewal. A temporary system issue prevented immediate access to the policy, so the agent offered to follow up later. The customer agreed to this arrangement.
